dreisoft.tresos.guidedconfig.api.memento

Class Memento

  • java.lang.Object
    • dreisoft.tresos.guidedconfig.api.memento.Memento

  • public class Memento
extends java.lang.Object
    Mementos form the data model of a guided configuration wizard.

    Mementos form a tree with a root memento that can be queried via AbstractBackend.getMemento():

    Memento root = backend.getMemento(); root = memento.getRoot();

    or

    Memento root = memento.getRoot();

    Each memento has an id that is unique concernings its parent: 

     Memento memento = backend.getMementoFactory().getMemento(parent, id);
 memento.getId();

    Mementos can have attributes in the form of tag/value pairs: 

     String value = memento.getString("stringAttribute");
 memento.setString("stringAttribute", "value");
 String value = memento.getFloat("floatAttribute");
 memento.setFloat("floatAttribute", "value");

    Mementos can have child mementos: 

     memento.addMemento(childMemento);
 memento.getChildren();

    Mementos as well as attributes of mementos can be addressed by relative or absolute paths. Absolute path are of the form, where "/" represents the root memento. The id of the root memento is not part of an absolute path. 

     [ "/" memento-id ]* ["/" attribute-id ]?

    Mementos are automatically saved to an XML file when a wizard closes and restored on startup. Mementos are saved in the project directory beneath .prefs/ with the filename <wizard-id>.mem.

    Mementos are created by an AbstractMementoFactory. This allows to subclass mementos and provide a more convenient interface.

    Mementos can do a lot of sanity checking like checking that a memento-id has correct syntax. As this is time consuming this functionality is switched of in a production system when Options.setLogErrors(boolean) is turned to false.

    Copyright (C) Elektrobit Automotive GmbH - All rights reserved

    Since:
    2008.b

      • getModelRevision

        public long getModelRevision()
        Get the revision of the memento tree to see if the tree was changed.

        Each time the memento tree the revision is increased. The revision is stored in the root of the tree.

        Returns:
        The current revision of the whole model
        Since:
        2009.a

      • getMementoRevision

        public long getMementoRevision()
        Get the revision of this memento.

        The revision is reset to 0 when the memento is added to a new tree or removed from a tree.

        Returns:
        The revision of the memento
        Since:
        2009.a

        public Memento setMemento()

      • setMemento

        public Memento setMemento(java.lang.String path)
                   throws dreisoft.tresos.guidedconfig.api.internal.GuidedConfigException
        Adds a Memento to the specified path. If the path contains multiple not existing segments, all of them will be created, but only the least created Memento will be returned.
        Parameters:
        path - the path where the Memento shall be created
        Returns:
        the created Memento or null in case of an error
        Throws:
        dreisoft.tresos.guidedconfig.api.internal.GuidedConfigException - in case of an error
        Since:
        2008.b

      • setMemento

        public Memento setMemento(java.lang.String path,
                          int index)
                   throws dreisoft.tresos.guidedconfig.api.internal.GuidedConfigException
        Adds a Memento to the specified path.

        If the path contains multiple not existing segments, all of them will be created, but only the least created Memento will be returned.

        If an index is provided (index != -1) the new memento is placed at this index if the memento does not yet exist.

        Parameters:
        path - the path where the Memento shall be created
        index - the index at which to place the new child in the list of children (-1 for append to list of children)
        Returns:
        the created Memento or null in case of an error
        Throws:
        dreisoft.tresos.guidedconfig.api.internal.GuidedConfigException - in case of an error
        Since:
        2009.a

      • isMemento

        public boolean isMemento(java.lang.String path)
        Returns if the Memento to the given path exists
        Parameters:
        path - the path to the Memento
        Returns:
        true, if the Memento exists, false otherwise
        Since:
        2008.b

      • getParent

        public Memento getParent()
                  throws dreisoft.tresos.guidedconfig.api.internal.GuidedConfigException

        Returns:

        Throws:

        Since:
        2008.b

      • isParentOrSame

        public boolean isParentOrSame(Memento memento)
        Checks if a memento is same, child or sub child of this memento.
        Parameters:
        memento - the memento
        Returns:
        true if parent is on the same branch

      • getPath

        public java.lang.String getPath()
        Returns the path of the Memento.

        An absolute path is only returned if this memento tree has a root memento (is part of a tree). Else a relative path is returned.

        Returns:
        the path of the Memento
        Since:
        2008.b

      • getPath

        public java.lang.String getPath(java.lang.String path)
        Get the path to the child with the given id.

        If the child exists its path is returned . If it does not exist the path is created from path of this memento + "/" + id.

        Parameters:
        path - id of the child memento (not be null or TAG_NOID).
        Returns:
        The path to the child
        Since:
        2009.a

      • getPath

        public java.lang.String getPath(java.lang.String path,
                                boolean normalize)
        Get the path to the child with the given id.

        If the child exists its path is returned. If it does not exist the path is created from path of this memento + "/" + id.

        Parameters:
        path - id of the child memento (not be null or TAG_NOID).
        Returns:
        The path to the child
        Since:
        2009.a

      • getPath

        public java.lang.String getPath(int index)
        Get the path to the child with the given index.

        If the child exists its getIdInPath() is used. If it does not exist the index is used.

        Parameters:
        index - The index of the child
        Returns:
        The path to the child
        Since:
        2009.a

      • getAbsolutePath

        public java.lang.String getAbsolutePath(java.lang.String path)
        Make path absolute.

        If the path is absolute the path is returned. If not the path is interpreted as a relative path to this memento and the absolute path is returned.

        An absolute path is only returned if this memento tree has a root memento (is part of a tree). Else a relative path is returned.

        Parameters:
        path - The path to make absolute
        Returns:
        The absolute path
        Since:
        2008.b

      • getAbsolutePath

        public java.lang.String getAbsolutePath(java.lang.String path,
                                        boolean normalize)
        Make path absolute.

        If the path is absolute the path is returned. If not the path is interpreted as a relative path to this memento and the absolute path is returned.

        An absolute path is only returned if this memento tree has a root memento (is part of a tree). Else a relative path is returned.

        Parameters:
        path - The path to make absolute
        Returns:
        The absolute path
        Since:
        2008.b

      • getAttributeId

        public java.lang.String getAttributeId(java.lang.String path)
        Extract the attribute-id from a path.

        This method does not check if the attribute exists neither it checks if thw attribute does not collide with an existing memento.

        Parameters:
        path - The path to split (must not be null or an empty string)
        Returns:
        The id of the attribute
        Since:
        2008.b

      • getMementoPath

        public java.lang.String getMementoPath(java.lang.String path)
        Extract the path to a the memento assuming the path contains an attribute reference at the end.

        This method does not check if the memento exists neither it checks if the last part is really an attribute.

        Parameters:
        path - The path to split
        Returns:
        An absolute path to an memento
        Since:
        2008.b

      • getMementoPath

      • setId

        public void setId(java.lang.String newId)
           throws dreisoft.tresos.guidedconfig.api.internal.GuidedConfigException
        Renames the memento id to the specified name.

        The methods checks that the parent memento not already has a memento with the same name.

        The method checks that the memento factory would not create a memento of another type for the new id.

        Parameters:
        newId - the new Memento id (must not be a number)
        Throws:
        dreisoft.tresos.guidedconfig.api.internal.GuidedConfigException - in case of an error
        Since:
        2008.b
